On Mar 7, 2012, at 7:10 PM, Glenn Block wrote:

>  is the application the =

I try to explain th=
is in slides 9 through 19 of

http://www.slideshare.net/algermissen/res-tfu=
l-httppatternsantipatterns

You see all the build-transitions in one slide,=
but I still hope you get the idea. It is, BTW, an aspect of Roy's work and =

ast it was for me.
